SPANSELF.title: SPANSELF
SPANSELF.description: If this survey had only been available in English, would you... Have been able to do the survey easily in English, Have been able to do the survey with difficulty, or Not have been able to do the survey? Don't know REFUSED NA
enumDescriptions: Our office sometimes needs to confirm that interviews were conducted. These next questions will be used
for that purpose.  Your answers will remain confidential.
